column4: Hey when I try to boot off the standard amd64 10.04.2 CD on my computer I get a blank screen after the ubuntu loading screen (purple with ubuntu letters).  My computer is an HP Elite Pavilion with an ATI 5570.  Maybe it's a video card issue?
your laptop is prob not supported.
Maybe I mispoke on the model but it's actually a tower.  And 11.04 boots up but it's kind of a long story so I'm trying 10.04.
